subTitle.title: Increases System Lifespan
subTitle.description: Proper maintenance extends the life of your HVAC system

subTitle.title: Lowers Utility Bills
subTitle.description: A well-maintained system runs more efficiently, reducing energy costs

subTitle.title: Prevents Costly Repairs
subTitle.description: Routine checkups help detect small issues before they become major problems

subTitle.title: Improves Indoor Air Quality
subTitle.description: Clean filters, coils, and ductwork mean healthier air for your home

starterKit.name: Comfort Shield Plan - 1st System (Basic Maintenance)
features: Bi-annual system tune-ups to keep everything running smoothly
Comprehensive safety checks and performance evaluations
Priority scheduling for faster service response times
Member discounts on parts and repair services

professionalToolbox.name: Comfort Defender Plan - 1st System (Advanced Maintenance)
features: Enhanced maintenance with detailed component inspections
Air quality testing and filter recommendations included
Extended service hours with no overtime charges
Higher savings on repairs and system upgrades

enterpriseSuite.name: Comfort Elite Plan - 1st System (Premium Maintenance & Protection)
enterpriseSuite.description: Best for ultimate peace of mind
features: Complete system deep cleaning and optimization services
Maximum priority access with front-of-line service
Extended warranty coverage on all repair work
Exclusive installation discounts and premium support
